CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Quote_Type__c ='Direct CPQ', Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Is_List_Price_Only__c = false), If(Name = 'Subtotal - Standard Price (One Time)', IF(OR( Round(Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c,5) < Round(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.NokiaCPQ_Total_Extended_Floor_Price__c,5), Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.NokiaCPQ_Count_Of_Red_Lights__c > 0), 'RED', IF( Round(Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c,5) >= Round(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.NokiaCPQ_Total_Extended_Floor_Price__c,5) , 'GREEN', '') ) , ''), '')
CustomField.label: Guidance Traffic Light
